data.comment: Today's referee, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza, has blown to start the match.
Atletico Mineiro awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Botafogo.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a throw-in for Atletico Mineiro, close to Botafogo's area.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 4, Goal kick for Botafogo at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Botafogo.
Atletico Mineiro drives forward and Guilherme Arana gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 6, Free kick Botafogo.
Can Atletico Mineiro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Botafogo's half?
Botafogo pushes forward through Luis Henrique Tomaz de Lima, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 8, Botafogo have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
Luis Henrique Tomaz de Lima (Botafogo) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Keno gets his shot on target but fails to score for Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 9, In Rio de Janeiro Atletico Mineiro drive forward through Guilherme Arana. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
Atletico Mineiro's Alan Franco misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 10, It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
Ball safe as Botafogo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Botafogo have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
In the minute 11, Atletico Mineiro awarded a free kick in their own half.
Atletico Mineiro's Allan is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 15, Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
Botafogo needs to be cautious. Atletico Mineiro have an attacking throw-in.
Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Botafogo at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Botafogo in their own half.
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
In the minute 18, Atletico Mineiro are pushing forward but Alan Franco's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Botafogo goal kick.
Keno of Atletico Mineiro smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 20, Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Atletico Mineiro have a dangerous throw-in.
Hyoran (Atletico Mineiro) strikes at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos but his header is cleared.
In the minute 22, Throw-in Atletico Mineiro.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro.
Throw-in high up the field for Atletico Mineiro in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 25, Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
Atletico Mineiro attack and a brilliant heading opportunity is created for Junior Alonso but the ball cannons into the bar!
In the minute 25, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza awards Botafogo a goal kick.
Throw-in for Botafogo in their own half.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Luiz Fernando.
In the minute 28, In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Botafogo in their own half.
Atletico Mineiro's Marquinhos gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 30, Botafogo have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Botafogo at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
Free kick for Botafogo in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 32, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a Atletico Mineiro throw-in in Botafogo's half.
Atletico Mineiro drive upfield and Marquinhos gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Botafogo defender.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 35, Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
In Rio de Janeiro, Marquinhos (Atletico Mineiro) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Keno of Atletico Mineiro gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 38, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza awards Botafogo a goal kick.
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Botafogo in their own half.
In the minute 42, It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
Keno for Atletico Mineiro drives towards goal at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 44, Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
Atletico Mineiro's Marrony gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 45, Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Botafogo are coming forward and Pedro Raul gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Atletico Mineiro goal kick.
Atletico Mineiro to take a throw-in in Botafogo territory.
In the minute 45, Hyoran (Atletico Mineiro) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza blows to end the first-half.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, The home team replace Pedro Raul with Rafael Forster.
The home team have replaced Luiz Otavio with Caio Alexandre. This is the first substitution made today by Paulo Autuori.
Marquinhos (Atletico Mineiro) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 47, In Rio de Janeiro Atletico Mineiro attack through Hyoran. The finish is off target, however.
Botafogo have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 49, Atletico Mineiro's Hyoran misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
Corner awarded to Botafogo.
In the minute 51, Atletico Mineiro drives forward and Hyoran gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Luis Henrique Tomaz de Lima of Botafogo gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Atletico Mineiro goal kick.
In the minute 52, Atletico Mineiro are coming forward and Hyoran gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Botafogo at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
Atletico Mineiro awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 54, Throw-in Botafogo.
In Rio de Janeiro, Botafogo push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Jefferson Savarino is on a sub for Alan Franco for Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 56, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza blows against Atletico Mineiro's Keno for offside.
Can Botafogo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Atletico Mineiro's half?
Corner awarded to Botafogo.
In the minute 58, Botafogo have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
Botafogo have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza awards Atletico Mineiro a goal kick.
In the minute 59, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza awards the away team a throw-in.
Botafogo have a goal kick.
Bruno Silva is replacing Marrony for the away team.
In the minute 62, Atletico Mineiro's Bruno Silva gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Botafogo defender.
Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
Botafogo pushes forward through Luiz Fernando, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 63, Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza awards Botafogo a goal kick.
Atletico Mineiro push forward at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos and Allan gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Botafogo defence.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Atletico Mineiro close to the penalty box.
In the minute 68, Free kick Botafogo.
In the minute 68, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Luis Henrique Tomaz de Lima.
Bruno Nazario (Botafogo) has replaced the possibly injured Luis Henrique Tomaz de Lima.
Goal kick for Atletico Mineiro at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
Jefferson Savarino hits the bar! Nearly a goal there for Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 70, Botafogo to take a throw-in in Atletico Mineiro territory.
Matheus Babi for Botafogo drives towards goal at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Botafogo have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 72, Ball safe as Atletico Mineiro is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Rhuan is replacing Luiz Fernando for Botafogo at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
Important block from the Botafogo defence as Hyoran fires in a strike for Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 75, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Federico Barrandeguy for Botafogo who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Free kick for Botafogo in their own half.
At Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos, Federico Barrandeguy has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 77, Botafogo's Federico Barrandeguy looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Danilo Barcelos is booked for the home team.
Atletico Mineiro awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 80, Ball goes out of play for a Botafogo goal kick.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Federico Barrandeguy (Botafogo) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Fernando Costanza.
In the minute 82, In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
In the minute 83, Atletico Mineiro's Bruno Silva breaks free at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Botafogo have a goal kick.
Free kick Botafogo.
In the minute 85, Botafogo have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
In the minute 85, Atletico Mineiro make their fifth substitution with Mailton replacing Marquinhos.
Jorge Sampaoli is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos with Jair replacing Allan.
Atletico Mineiro make their third substitution with Mariano replacing Guga.
Ball safe as Atletico Mineiro is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 87, Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
Goal! Botafogo extend their lead to 2-0 through Caio Alexandre.
Great play from Matheus Babi to set up the goal.
Free kick for Botafogo in their own half.
Atletico Mineiro awarded a throw-in in their own half.
At Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos the fourth official shows that 6 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Can Atletico Mineiro capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Botafogo's half?
Atletico Mineiro drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Danilo Barcelos returns to the field for Botafogo after picking up a slight injury.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a Atletico Mineiro throw-in in Botafogo's half.
Ball goes out of play for a Botafogo goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
Hyoran (Atletico Mineiro) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In Rio de Janeiro, Guilherme Arana of Atletico Mineiro is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
That's full-time at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos. The final score is 2-1.
Danilo Barcelos is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Atletico Mineiro are back in the match in Rio de Janeiro. Igor Rabello has scored to make it 2-1.
That's a fine assist from Jair.
